Home » 38P2 Dhammānuloma (1), Dukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (2) » 10 Mahantaraduka » 10.14 Upādinnaduka » 10.14.1 Paṭiccavāra » 10.14.1.1 Paccayānuloma » 10.14.1.1.1 Vibhaṅgavāra
Adhipati
Mahantaraduka
Upādinnaduka
Paṭiccavāra
Paccayānuloma
Vibhaṅgavāra
Adhipati
418.
3381Anupādinnaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anupādinno dhammo uppajjati adhipatipaccayā—  anupādinnaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ…pe…  dve khandhe…pe…  ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ paṭicca…pe…  mahābhūte paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ upādārūpaṃ. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
